title: The Oberoi Amarvilas, Agra only Indian hotel to feature in Inaugural Ranking of the Worldâ€™s 50 Best Hotels 2023
description: The Oberoi Amarvilas in Agra, India has been named the only Indian hotel on The World's 50 Best Hotels 2023 list. The list recognizes hotels from 35 destinations worldwide and marks the first global ranking release by 50 Best since 2009. The Oberoi Amarvilas is located near the Taj Mahal and its selection reflects the dedication and allure of the property.
